Articles.Content:
Hi.

Under Real Fuels, RCS does not fire.

Should I post the output.log?

Do you have ModuleRCSFX? What did you configure the RCS to, and does it have crossfeed from the tank where the propellant for which it is configured is stored? RF eliminates "magic" propellant flow for RCS.

Do you have ModuleRCSFX? What did you configure the RCS to, and does it have crossfeed from the tank where the propellant for which it is configured is stored? RF eliminates "magic" propellant flow for RCS.

Imgur album: http://imgur.com/gallery/U7H4x/new

Clearly, the RCS thrusters are placed directly on the fuel tank, and I checked several times that the fuel/engine Gui setting is the same.

Here's a Mediafire link to the output log.

My untrained eyes see no major error.

Can't really tell from the darkness, but it looks like they're on wings not tanks?

The log has 'access denied', also.

Can't really tell from the darkness, but it looks like they're on wings not tanks?

The log has 'access denied', also.

I put two thrusters on the wing tips, and four on the nose cone/rcs tank.

Fixed link: http://www./download/ftfp8vieu0q2bki/output_log.txt

Thanks for all your help, by the way.

IIRC, RCS requires pressurised tank, is there any chance you forgot to change the procedural tank's type (to ServiceModule) ?

And mediafire link still shows access denied for viewing, BTW.

Sorry, was away for a few days.

Can you please (a) make the link public, and ( show a screenshot from the VAB ?

IGNORE/DELETE PLEASE, WRONG THREAD

Edited January 27, 2016 by hieywiey
